description: Defines the event fields our system recognizes as a purchase event
title: Payment Event Fields Schema

___name.description: Name of the product being viewed
___name.title: Product Name

___price.description: Price of the product being viewed
___price.title: Price

___coupon.description: Coupon code associated with a product (e.g MAY_DEALS_3)
___coupon.title: Coupon

___sku.description: Sku of the product being viewed
___sku.title: Stock Keeping Unit

___product_id.description: Database id of the product being viewed
___product_id.title: Product ID

___currency.description: The ISO currency code used in this purchase
___currency.title: Currency

___coupon.description: Transaction coupon redeemed with the transaction
___coupon.title: Coupon

___shipping.description: Shipping cost associated with the transaction
___shipping.title: Shipping Cost

___name.description: Name of the product being viewed
___name.title: Product Name

___price.description: Price of the product being viewed
___price.title: Price

___coupon.description: Coupon code associated with a product (e.g MAY_DEALS_3)
___coupon.title: Coupon

___sku.description: Sku of the product being viewed
___sku.title: Stock Keeping Unit

___product_id.description: Database id of the product being viewed
___product_id.title: Product ID

___checkout_id.description: The checkout ID associated with this purchase
___checkout_id.title: Checkout ID

___total.description: Revenue with discounts and coupons added in
___total.title: Purchase Total

___tax.description: Total tax associated with the transaction
___tax.title: Total Tax

___revenue.description: Revenue associated with the transaction (excluding shipping and tax). This is the field we use to calculate a customer's LTV.
___revenue.title: Revenue

___discount.description: Total discount associated with the transaction
___discount.title: Discount

___order_id.description: The order or transaction ID associated with this purchase
___order_id.title: Order ID

___affiliation.description: Store or affiliation from which this transaction occurred (e.g. Google Store)
___affiliation.title: Affiliation
